metadata.title: CVE-2021-33294 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
In elfutils 0.183, an infinite loop was found in the function handle_symtabin readelf.c .Which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (infiniteloop) via crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

debuginfod - 0.188-2.1
elfutils - 0.188-2.1
libasm1 - 0.188-2.1
libdebuginfod-common - 0.188-2.1
libdebuginfod1 - 0.188-2.1
libdw1 - 0.188-2.1
libelf1 - 0.188-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.188-2.1').
